channel.title: award on SwissRN
channel.description: Recent content in award on SwissRN

item.title: Call for Swiss Reproducibility Award and Swiss Reproducibility Conference 2024
item.description: The Swiss National Science Foundation and the Swiss Reproducibility Network invite you to submit abstracts for the Swiss Reproducibility Conference, taking place June, 10 - 11, 2024 in Zürich, as well as nominations for the Swiss Reproducibility Award 2024. First Swiss Reproducibility Conference: Call for Contributed Talks and Posters Don’t miss the opportunity to present your work at the first Swiss Reproducibility Conference that takes place June 10 - 11, 2024.
